main event: A bright object, about the size of a large cantaloupe, was observed moving rapidly through the sky before stopping and hovering for a few seconds on August 13, 1957.
interesting points: The object had a blue center and a very bright white edge., It made no sound during the observation., The object moved away rapidly after hovering., The conclusion of the analysis was that it was possibly a hallucination., There was a previous report of a sighting in the area analyzed as probably a satellite.
sighted object: a bright round object with a blue center and white edge
witness description: Witness from 1712 Clay Avenue, Fresno, California
